price: Nyamara abenshi muri bo ntibashobora kwemera Allah batamubangikanyije.
arabic: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُهُم بِٱللَّهِ إِلَّا وَهُم مُّشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā yu'minu aktharuhum bil-lahi illā wahum mush'rikūna
